column1: Uncontrolled data used in OS command
column2: Using user-supplied data in an OS command, without neutralizing special elements, can make code vulnerable to command injection.
column4: This argument to an OS command is derived from [["user input (a command-line argument)"|"relative:///codeql-eg-c-ExecTainted.c:7:26:7:29"]], dangerously concatenated into [["snprintf output argument"|"relative:///codeql-eg-c-ExecTainted.c:15:14:15:20"]], and then passed to system((unnamed parameter 0)).
